channel.title: Twitter / Elder_Pliny
channel.description: Twitter updates from Pliny the Elder / Elder_Pliny.

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Breathing now impossible. http://t.co/UQN6TvWF #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Breathing now impossible. http://t.co/UQN6TvWF #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: The air is thick with ash. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: The air is thick with ash. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: The waves are wild and dangerous. http://t.co/UQN6TvWF #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: The waves are wild and dangerous. http://t.co/UQN6TvWF #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Our only possible escape is by boat. http://t.co/UQN6TvWF #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Our only possible escape is by boat. http://t.co/UQN6TvWF #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: It’s daytime, but blacker than any night. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: It’s daytime, but blacker than any night. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Rocks are falling everywhere around us. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Rocks are falling everywhere around us. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Tying pillows to our heads with cloth and heading for the shore. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Tying pillows to our heads with cloth and heading for the shore. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Woke up to violent shaking. The courtyard is full of ash and pumice. http://t.co/vrnYc0kK #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Woke up to violent shaking. The courtyard is full of ash and pumice. http://t.co/vrnYc0kK #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: I’m off to bed, but my companions are reluctant to sleep. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: I’m off to bed, but my companions are reluctant to sleep. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Just returned to Pomponianus' villa. We’ll rest here for the night. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Just returned to Pomponianus' villa. We’ll rest here for the night. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Walking through town. We can see broad sheets of flames rising from Pompeii. http://t.co/t9CjMm7N #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Walking through town. We can see broad sheets of flames rising from Pompeii. http://t.co/t9CjMm7N #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Urged Pomponianus to stay calm and join me at a bathhouse. http://t.co/7SAX2Q4V #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Urged Pomponianus to stay calm and join me at a bathhouse. http://t.co/7SAX2Q4V #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Found my friend Pomponianus on shore loading his belongings into a ship. http://t.co/UQN6TvWF #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Found my friend Pomponianus on shore loading his belongings into a ship. http://t.co/UQN6TvWF #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Strong winds forced us to land in Stabiae. http://t.co/UQN6TvWF #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Strong winds forced us to land in Stabiae. http://t.co/UQN6TvWF #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: My helmsman is urging me to turn back. I respond, fortune favors the courageous! http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: My helmsman is urging me to turn back. I respond, fortune favors the courageous! http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Pompeii is blocked by debris. Refugees on shore are crying out for help. http://t.co/sJxSH5QY #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Pompeii is blocked by debris. Refugees on shore are crying out for help. http://t.co/sJxSH5QY #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Our course is straight into the danger zone. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #Pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Our course is straight into the danger zone. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #Pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Setting out across the Bay of Naples. Ash and pumice are pummeling our boat. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Setting out across the Bay of Naples. Ash and pumice are pummeling our boat. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: My voyage of curiosity has turned to courage. http://t.co/bAWbVBgJ #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: My voyage of curiosity has turned to courage. http://t.co/bAWbVBgJ #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Just received a letter from my wife's sister, Rectina. Her villa is at the foot of Mount Vesuvius. http://t.co/bAWbVBgJ #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Just received a letter from my wife's sister, Rectina. Her villa is at the foot of Mount Vesuvius. http://t.co/bAWbVBgJ #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Asked my nephew to join me, but he's intent on studying. http://t.co/dv0LjuVw #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Asked my nephew to join me, but he's intent on studying. http://t.co/dv0LjuVw #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: The scientist in me wants to get a closer look. Having my boat made ready. http://t.co/dv0LjuVw #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: The scientist in me wants to get a closer look. Having my boat made ready. http://t.co/dv0LjuVw #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: A cloud made of ash and dirt appears to be coming from Mount Vesuvius. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: A cloud made of ash and dirt appears to be coming from Mount Vesuvius. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: A strange cloud is rising in the distance. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: A strange cloud is rising in the distance. http://t.co/Km4L1ko8 #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: Enjoying lunch on the balcony after a cold bath. http://t.co/dv0LjuVw #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: Enjoying lunch on the balcony after a cold bath. http://t.co/dv0LjuVw #pompeii24

item.title: Elder_Pliny: The gods must be roaming the earth. I felt the ground shake this morning. #pompeii24
item.description: Elder_Pliny: The gods must be roaming the earth. I felt the ground shake this morning. #pompeii24
